This is an R Markdown document to demonstrate how to put Latex-formatted equations in an R Markdown document.

Here is an equation for the area of a pizza:

$$
A = \pi r^2
$$

```{r pizza_sizes}
d_large <- 18
d_medium <- 12
d_small <- 8
```

For our large pizza, d=`r d_large` inches:

```{r pizza_area_large}
Area <- function(diameter){
  pi * (diameter/2)^2
}
```

This gives us an area of `r round(Area(d_large),1)` square inches.

```{r calculate_area}
A_large <- Area(d_large)
```
